thread.section_title: Currencyonline Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Currencyonline | currencyonline.com
thread.title: Joseph

author: Joseph
title: Joseph
text:
I moved overseas and wanted to be able to transfer money between my bank accounts in different countries. After some Googling I can across CurrencyOnline and tried a $10 transfer to see what it was like and how easy it was etc. I've since transferred tens of thousands of dollars multiple times and have never had a problem. 100% satisfied.
The only downside is that the whole process can take a few working days but I reckon this would be the case with any company so it doesn't even bother me.
